definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: There was an old door there, on crusty hinges.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有一扇陳舊的門，門的合葉很難轉動。

sentences.english: The rear door is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.
sentences.chinese: 後門是在頂部接裝的合葉，以便於向上開。

sentences.english: All doors shall be equipped with self-closing hinge.
sentences.chinese: 所有門應該配置自動關閉合葉。

sentences.english: Could you buy a new hinge for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我買一個新的合葉嗎？

sentences.english: The doors would be taken off their hinges; Rumpelmayer's men were coming.
sentences.chinese: 有幾扇門要卸下合葉，琅勃邁爾的工人們會來。
